title: 46. Could Long Covid Help Treat Other Chronic Illnesses?
description: Chronic fatigue syndrome looks remarkably similar to Long Covid, but has been ignored by the medical community. Could patients finally get some answers to their debilitating illness?
author: bapu@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
